content: in this legal case the trani court ruled on the dissolution of a real estate property owned by multiple parties the court declared the dissolution and assigned the entire ownership of the property to the defendants the defendants were also ordered to pay the plaintiff a total sum of 23866667 euros plus interest the case involved the inheritance of the property and the division of assets among the parties the court found that the claims made by both parties regarding collation and accounting were not supported by sufficient evidence the courtappointed expert determined that the property could be conveniently divided among the parties with the defendants being assigned the entirety of the property the value of the plaintiffs share was determined to be 23866667 euros the court also ruled that twothirds of the litigation costs would be offset and the plaintiff was ordered to pay the remaining costs the ruling was made on march 20 2018 in trani
